document_data.caption: A map of showing the Griffon Mountains near Heldapan.
document_data.name: Griffon Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Griffon Mountains''' were a small mountain range located in the [[Durpar]].
document_data.Geography: This mountain range rested between the [[Scarlet Jungle]] and the [[River Hiedar]].
document_data.Description: Though the surrounding countryside was extremely rocky, the peaks of the Griffon Mountians were not that high.
document_data.Inhabitants: Flocks of [[griffons]] lived in and around the mountain range. Many native Durparians made a living hunting or capturing the griffons.
